values: 暴徒；恶棍；强硬分子；难对付的人；顽固分子
（物质，物体）坚固的；（政策或行动）强硬的；吃苦耐劳的；顽固的；困难的；（食物）老的；不易切开的；（人）粗暴的；粗鲁的；（地区）充满暴力与犯罪的
坚持；忍受；忍耐；顽强应对；硬挺过去；经受住考验
坚韧地；顽强地；困难地；艰苦地；严格地；毫不妥协地

synonym.mean: 艰苦的，困难的；坚强的，不屈不挠的；坚韧的，牢固的；强壮的，结实的

word_mean_info__list.difference: 多指能给人留下身体健康、思想健全或品德良好等印象。
既可指健壮又可指健全无病。
既指体格健壮，又指体力或精神上的力量。
侧重身体各部分或器官没有病，无任何缺陷，即健康。
指身体无病，也可指身心健全、正常的。
指人强健有力，精力充沛。
仅指没有疾病，但不一定很健康。

word_group.brief_definition: (表示同情)真不幸, 真不走运
立场坚定, 态度坚决
难以对付的人；可怕的人
难以解决的问题；棘手的事情；劲敌
硬汉；坚强的家伙；倔强的家伙
艰苦的游戏；艰难的比赛；艰苦的比赛
刁钻问题；棘手的问题；尖锐的问题
大胆果断的人；暴躁的人
艰难的路；艰苦的道路；不好走的路

bilingual.source: You need gut to make tough decisions.
bilingual.target: 做出艰难的决定需要勇气。

bilingual.source: We all have lived through tough times.
bilingual.target: 我们都经历过艰难的时刻。

bilingual.source: This mantra helped her through tough times.
bilingual.target: 这句真言帮助她度过了艰难的时刻。

bilingual.source: Splitting up was a tough decision for them.
bilingual.target: 分手对他们来说是一个艰难的决定。

bilingual.source: The home team prevailed after a tough match.
bilingual.target: 主队在一场艰难的比赛后获胜了。

bilingual.source: As a commander, he must make tough decisions.
bilingual.target: 作为统领，他必须做出艰难的决定。

bilingual.source: They won the championship after a tough season.
bilingual.target: 他们在艰难的赛季后赢得了冠军。

bilingual.source: The couple went through a tough divorce process.
bilingual.target: 这对夫妇经历了艰难的离婚过程。

bilingual.source: Forgoing the meeting was a tough decision for him.
bilingual.target: 放弃会议对他来说是一个艰难的决定。

bilingual.source: They were oot of the playoffs after a tough season.
bilingual.target: 在艰难的赛季后，他们被淘汰出局。

list.abstract: tough品牌是创始于1994年的军款品牌。
《TOUGH》是中岛美嘉第8张个人专辑，共收录《恋爱》《花束》《Forget me not》等14首歌曲，于2017年3月22日发行。

yingyinNormal.en: It's too heavy. Well, that's tough because I'm not carrying it for you anymore!
yingyinNormal.zh: 这包太重了。生活是艰难的，因为以后我不会再帮你背着包了。

yingyinNormal.en: Mm. Tough decision. There's no weaponry from Lord of the Rings forged in a Chinese sweatshop?
yingyinNormal.zh: 真是艰难的抉择，这里没有中国血汗工厂伪造的那种《指环王》里的武器吗？

yingyinNormal.en: The asset? Look, I get it. You're in charge out here. You gotta make a lot of tough decisions.
yingyinNormal.zh: 资产？听着，我懂，这里你说的算，你有很多艰难的决定要做。

yingyinNormal.en: We were playing bad. We were tired, and I was like, "man, this is gonna be a tough one to pull out."
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们那场打得很糟糕，全队都很疲惫“这将是一场艰难的比赛”

yingyinNormal.en: Americans have fought their way back from tough economic times but the deck is still stacked in favor of those at the top.
yingyinNormal.zh: 美国已经从艰难的经济形势中恢复，但机遇仍然存在并青睐那些位于顶端的人。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, Rizzo. Tough and tender.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是的，雷索，铁汉柔情。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, not a fan of the tough love.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，你好像不喜欢苦涩的爱情。

yingyinNormal.en: Judge rules, Nutter-Butter. Oh, tough call. Yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 裁判判决。是奶油。真的很难决定。

yingyinNormal.en: I know it's tough now, but things will get better.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那真的很难，但情况会有改善的。

yingyinNormal.en: Unless they're German, 'cause that's a tough crowd.
yingyinNormal.zh: 除非取悦对象是德国人，因为他们的笑点太高了。

yingyinNormal.en: What's that? Uberweiss. It's new. It's German. It's extra tough.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是什么？乌伯怀斯，来自德国的新产品，洗净力超强。

yingyinNormal.en: I suspect she's quite a tough nut. And I'm quite a tough nutcracker.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我看她应该不好对付。我也不是好打发的。

yingyinNormal.en: And I told her, I said, The Conways are tough opponents. And she said, They may be tough, but they're not Texas tough.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我告诉她，康威夫妇是非常厉害的对手，她说，也许是吧，但也不比德州人。

yingyinNormal.en: As an athlete, when you finish playing it's a tough time, you know, I found it tough.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对于运动员来讲，退役之后的日子很难熬，我觉得很难熬。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《大卫·贝克汉姆：探索未知之境》

yingyinNormal.en: New York has always been a place where "when the going got tough, the tough got going".
yingyinNormal.zh: 纽约有句格言：「越难走的路，越要勇敢地走下去」。

yingyinNormal.en: Why don't you just call him and tell him that you can't take the meeting, old toughy-tough-super-tough?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你何不直接给他打电话，告诉他你没法去开会了，超级无敌女汉子姐？

yingyinNormal.en: Why are you broken? Remember how I was tough and edgy? Yeah. Remember how I was just like you? Yeah! I was tough and edgy!
yingyinNormal.zh: 你为什么要变？记得以前我是多么咄咄逼人锋芒毕露吗？记得。记得我跟你有多像吗？嗯，我就是咄咄逼人锋芒毕露。

yingyinNormal.en: Some of us have a tough time holding on to branches.
yingyinNormal.zh: 攀在树上不容易。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, was this a tough case? Yes, yes it was. You see?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这案子不简单吗？确实是，懂了吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Wow. And around the ankles, you know that is a tough spot.
yingyinNormal.zh: 连脚踝周围都剃光了，那里很不好刮。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: having or causing problems or difficulties

examination_example.sentence: Think about how <highlight>tough</highlight> it is to get together 15 people, much less 50, who all get along perfectly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 想想看，15个人聚在一起有多难，更别说50个人了，而且他们都相处得很好。

examination_example.sentence: Pete Schneider considers the climb <highlight>tougher</highlight> today.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 皮特·施耐德认为如今人生进阶更加艰难。

examination_example.sentence: Sometimes it is easy to feel bad because you are going through <highlight>tough</highlight> times.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有时候很容易感觉不好，因为你正在经历艰难的时期。

sense_info_list.en: demonstrating a strict and uncompromising attitude or approach

examination_example.sentence: Researchers should improve their standards, he wrote in Nature in 2012, but journals should also take a <highlight>tougher</highlight> line.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他2012年在《自然》杂志上写道，研究人员应该提高自己的业务水平，但是杂志也应该严格把关。

examination_example.sentence: It is as though 20 years of ever-<highlight>tougher</highlight> reforms of the job search and benefit administration system never happened.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这就好像，20年来对求职和福利管理体制进行的越来越严厉的改革，从未发生过。

sense_info_list.en: able to endure hardship or pain
unfortunate for someone in a way that seems unfair
(of a substance or object) strong enough to withstand adverse conditions or rough or careless handling

word_usage.usage: tough作形容词，可用于名词前，修饰该名词，如：a tough childhood；也可用于系动词之后，后面常接on/with sb./sth.，如：Don't be too tough on him.

exam_freq_info.chinese: 强硬的; 严厉的; 无情的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 强健；坚韧；有粘性；韧性

word_family.mean: n. 粗暴的人；有暴力倾向的人

sense_info_list.en: demonstrating a strict and uncompromising attitude or approach
sense_info_list.zh: 强硬的; 严厉的; 无情的

examination_example.sentence: Several European capitals, including Paris and Berlin, are leading a campaign for <highlight>tougher</highlight> regulation by the European Union.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 包括巴黎和柏林在内的几个欧洲国家的首都，正在领导一场由欧盟实施更严格监督的运动。

sense_info_list.en: having or causing problems or difficulties

examination_example.sentence: It's <highlight>tough</highlight> to quantify how good a person is at remembering.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 量化一个人的记忆力是很难的。

sense_info_list.en: (of a substance or object) strong enough to withstand adverse conditions or rough or careless handling
able to endure hardship or pain; having the confidence and determination to cope in difficult situations
unfortunate for someone in a way that seems unfair

exam_freq_info.chinese: 强硬的; 严厉的; 无情的

sense_info_list.en: having or causing problems or difficulties

examination_example.sentence: Those who like to make friends and help others can gather enough resources to make it through <highlight>tough</highlight> times.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那些喜欢结交朋友和帮助他人的人可以汇聚资源来度过难关。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: having or causing problems or difficulties

examination_example.sentence: For many people, the initial sense of urgency to create easily dies away because it requires making the <highlight>tough</highlight> decision.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对许多人来说，最初创造的紧迫感很容易消失，因为这需要做出艰难的决定。

examination_example.sentence: There were some <highlight>tough</highlight> times and I just felt extremely tired.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有一些艰难的时刻，我只是觉得非常累。

examination_example.sentence: Life must be pretty <highlight>tough</highlight> for his family now.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在他的家庭生活一定很艰难。

sense_info_list.en: unfortunate for someone in a way that seems unfair

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: unfortunate for someone in a way that seems unfair

examination_example.sentence: Compared to traveling, such social practice connects us and makes us learn how <highlight>tough</highlight> our parents are.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与旅行相比，这种社会实践将我们联系在一起，让我们认识到我们的父母有多严厉。
